title: 25: Twice In a Blue Moon
itunes:title: Twice In a Blue Moon
description: In the newest episode of The Readheads Book Club the girls are recapping and discussing Twice In a Blue Moon by Christina Lauren. It was Snitch's choice and it was a VERY Snitchy choice. As always they're casting the movie version of the book and giving it their overall rating. The next book is Jackie's choice and she chose American Duchess: A Novel of Consuelo Vanderbilt by Karen Harper. Follow @thereadheads on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thereadheads/ Join our Facebook group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/thereadheads/ Submit a question or comment to us at thereadheadsbookclub@gmail.com Shop Readheads Merch: https://shopmorningtoast.com/collections/the-readheads The overall Readheads Rating for Twice In a Blue Moon is 3.275 stars.
